title: Archive a Completed Project
description: A project has been completed and all payments settled. The PM must formally archive the project.

tasks.description: Run a final project closeout report, summarizing schedule performance, cost performance, and major issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive closeout report is generated.

tasks.description: Gather all project documents, including contracts, drawings, RFIs, and submittals, into a single archive file.
Set the project status to 'Archived' in the project management system, making it read-only.
